duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet with estate planning clients to make recommendations and secure representation.
Advise clients on using trusts for tax and asset protection.
Prepare drafting instructions for estate plan documents.
Assist clients in minimizing taxes on their estates.
Design, review, and edit estate plan documents.
Follow up with clients to review and explain the estate plan.
Keep up to date on the latest estate laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Law Degree from an accredited university is required. NYS licensed JD is required or ability to obtain.
